title: Navigating Licensing: What the Pennsylvania 3 Wheel Rider Course Offers
description: In Pennsylvania, the pathway to acquiring a motorcycle license tailored to three-wheel vehicles is accessible and advantageous. For those seeking to ride trikes, sidecars, and other three-wheeled motorcycles, the Pennsylvania Motorcycle Safety Program (PAMSP) offers a dedicated course designed to refine their skills and secure appropriate licensing.
